Corrupted: QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
Corrupted: QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and draw a card

Corrupted: Focusfire.NAME: Focus fire
Corrupted: Focusfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Magic 3: does !M! bonus damage.

Corrupted: BattleSense.NAME: Battle Sense
Corrupted: BattleSense.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Gain an aditional Dexterity when upgraded

Corrupted: ShortTerm.NAME: Short Term Investmenet
Corrupted: ShortTerm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mana. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 more than the Mana you have gained.

Corrupted: Flare.NAME: Flare
Corrupted: Flare.DESCRIPTION: apply 2 Vulnerable and remove 1 Strength on all enemies, NL When upgraded, apply an aditional Vulnerable

Corrupted: Overhead.NAME: Overhead Swing
Corrupted: Overhead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if it kills, NL apply 1 Vulnerable and reduce the Strength of a random enemy by 1.

Corrupted: TransMind.NAME: Transencent Mindset
Corrupted: TransMind.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 intangable, gain !M! Vulnerable. NL using this card increases the Vulnerable you get for the rest of combat.

Corrupted: ReinArmor.NAME: Reinforce Armor
Corrupted: ReinArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block and gain !M! Plated Armor. NL Magic 3: consume 1 Mana to increase the plated armor you get by 1.

Corrupted: SpecShot.NAME: Specialized Shot
Corrupted: SpecShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Magic 3: Apply !M! Poison and 1 Decay. NL Magic 5: Apply !M! Poison again and apply !M!-1 Weak.

Corrupted: PowerNap.NAME: Power Nap
Corrupted: PowerNap.DESCRIPTION: Consume 1 Mana to Gain !M! Regen. NL Magic 4: Gain an aditional Regen

Corrupted: Corrupt.NAME: Corrupt
Corrupted: Corrupt.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Decay, Apply !Mx2! Vulnerable, 1 Weak and 1 Strength. NL Apply !M! Poison and !Mp1! decay to all enemies.

Corrupted: EmbraceDarkness.NAME: Embrace Darkness
Corrupted: EmbraceDarkness.DESCRIPTION: gain !M! mana, gain !D! decay and draw !M! card(s).

Corrupted: InfernalForm.NAME: Infernal Form
Corrupted: InfernalForm.DESCRIPTION: You do not take damage from Decay. At the end of your turn, gain Mana equal to your Decay. You take twice as much damage from Poison. NL Ethereal(loses Ethereal).

Corrupted: ToxicWall.NAME: Toxic Wall
Corrupted: ToxicWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL This turn upon being attacked gain 1 Decay and apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

Corrupted: SpreadCorruption.NAME: Spread Corruption
Corrupted: SpreadCorruption.DESCRIPTION: At the Start of your turn, consume !M! Mana to apply !M! poison and decay to everyone.

Corrupted: LongTerm.NAME: Long Term Investment
Corrupted: LongTerm.DESCRIPTION: At the end of this turn and next turn, lose half(a third) of your Mana. At the start of the following 3 turns, gain half(two thirds) of your current Mana.

Corrupted: MagicArmor.NAME: Magic Armor
Corrupted: MagicArmor.DESCRIPTION: convert all of your mana into plated armor.

Corrupted: InnerHeaven.NAME: Inner Heaven
Corrupted: InnerHeaven.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! Decay. NL Gain 1 Mana per 5(4) Decay lost. NL Gain 1 Energy per 10(9) Decay lost.

Corrupted: Overload.NAME: Overload
Corrupted: Overload.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Mana. NL Magic 5(3): gain 2 Mana. NL Magic 15(10): Double your Mana. NL Exaust.

Corrupted: SappingStrike.NAME: Sapping Strike
Corrupted: SappingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and gain !M! Mana. NL Magic 3: Gain 1 Mana

Corrupted: DarkmagicSlice.NAME: Darkmagic Slice
Corrupted: DarkmagicSlice.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Magic 3: Does 5 aditional damage. NL magic 15: double damage.

Corrupted: ManaBurst.NAME: Mana Burst
Corrupted: ManaBurst.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! Mana to do !D! Damage 3 times.

Corrupted: BreakTheseCuffs.NAME: Break These Cuffs
Corrupted: BreakTheseCuffs.DESCRIPTION: Convert all Vulnerable, Weak and Frail into Decay. NL Exaust
Corrupted: BreakTheseCuffs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Convert all Vulnerable, Weak and Frail into Decay.

Corrupted: EndlessTorment.NAME: Endless Torment
Corrupted: EndlessTorment.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 2 decay to all enemies !M! times NL corruption 6: apply 6 poison and 1 weak to all enemies
Corrupted: EndlessTorment.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 2 decay to all enemies !M! times NL corruption 6: apply 6 poison and 2 weak to all enemies

Corrupted: HybridRounds.NAME: Hybrid Rounds
Corrupted: HybridRounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. The next attack you play this turn does !M! additional damage NL Magic 2,4,6: this card and your next attack this turn does 2 additional damage.

Corrupted: AmmoOfBlocking.NAME: Ammo Of Blocking
Corrupted: AmmoOfBlocking.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain !B! Block and your next attack will give you !M! Block. NL Magic 2,4,6: the next attack you play this turn gives you !B! Block.

Corrupted: Curse.NAME: Curse
Corrupted: Curse.DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 decay. NL Convert all of the targets Decay into poison.
Corrupted: Curse.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply 5 decay. NL Convert all of the targets Decay into !M! times as much poison.

Corrupted: ImmovableObject.NAME: Immovable Object
Corrupted: ImmovableObject.DESCRIPTION: Prevent the next time you'd take fatal damage.

Corrupted: DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Corrupted: DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Corrupted: DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A better defend
Corrupted: DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Corrupted: DefaultRareSkill.NAME: for each loop x2
Corrupted: DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Corrupted: DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Corrupted: DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Corrupted: DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.
